pkgmetadata.longdescription: # metabasepy: Python wrapper for metabase REST Api [![](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/metabasepy.svg?maxAge=3600)](https://pypi.org/project/metabasepy/)[![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/repos/github/mertsalik/metabasepy/badge.svg?branch=master)](https://coveralls.io/github/mertsalik/metabasepy?branch=master)## InstallingInstall metabasepy by running:```shellpip install metabasepy```## Documentation- [User Guide][]- [Commands Tutorial][][User Guide]: ./docs/guide.md[Commands Tutorial]: ./docs/commands.md
